code: export var required=function required(value){if(value&&value.length>0)return undefined;return'Field is required';};export var maxLength=function maxLength(max){return function(value){if(value&&value.length>max)return"Max length is ".concat(max);return undefined;};};export var minLength=function minLength(min){return function(value){if(value&&value.length<min)return"Min length is ".concat(min);return undefined;};};export var number=function number(value){return value&&isNaN(Number(value))?'Must be a number':undefined;};export var minValue=function minValue(min){return function(value){return value&&value<min?"Must be at least ".concat(min):undefined;};};export var email=function email(value){return value&&!/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(value)?'Invalid email address':undefined;};
